name: Disaster Master
description:
This game was developed as a school project.

Consists in surviving natural disasters, using W, A, S, D to move around, CTRL to crouch, E to open doors and interact with objects and the key shown on screen to complete the challenges.

!!! Stay tuned to updates :D !!!

Developers:

Cristina Béjinha - 2D/3D Artist, Environmental Artist, 3D Animator and contribution to Level Design

João Martins - Game Manager, Level Designer, UI Programmer and Sound Designer

João Pereira - Game Programmer and 3D Animator
